Need to upgrade the TV though. The image is blur and some times not very clear. Suspect it ain‚Äôt HD quality, that‚Äôs why. For a high grade hotel under the Shang label, they should seriously consider a better TV to offer to their guests, which makes it part of the the stay experience.

title: Great Service
desc: Stay at the hotel on 18 Jan 22. Check-in was a smooth and pleasant experience. The room was clean n big. this is on the 5th floor. The view was a bit blocked due to overgrown trees but the room will be good for families with children. breakfast was fantastic, as we enjoy a wide variety of food selections. Front off staff Xin Hui and Julie was very attentive and cheerfully and always answers all our queries. Keep up the good work. We were happy with our staycation and will be back on 17 Feb to celebrate my sister's Birthday. Thank you n see u again

title: Best place everrrr
desc: The best of all hotels in Singapore. Family friendly hotel, had most accomodation and activities for their hotel guest. Private beach with free kayak, canoe n paddle boat. Badminton, volleyball, tennis ball and few more games available at the beach all for free. Kids pool comes with slides n water play. Kids also had arts craft class and kids play area with balls n 2 storey slides. My daughter just love tis place. N not only her, me n my husband cnt wait to come bck. Went there for my birthday staycay. Got a surprise, yummy slice of chocolate cake. Theres too much to things to compliment. We just LOVE tis plc. Location very good. Rasa Sentosa, we are COMING BACK in April!!! Booked! See u in 2 mths time

title: Amazing Ambiance
desc: Superb for the amenities and service but I'm not satisfied with the buffet breakfast. I have stayed there for 4 days and it has the same menu from day 1 till day 4. Moreover, their breads are too sweet.

title: Wonderful experience
desc: We always have a wonderful experience when we stay in Rasa Sentosa. The hotel never fails to deliver well during check-in, the clean rooms, good food, fun activities and check-out. Thank you for adding in the 2-5pm fun activities for the children. It was very memorable!

title: A bit old fashion but pleasant
desc: We had an enjoyable time there. Great staff team who took pride in their work. Great variety of food for breakfast. Great place to chill out on beach. Nice pool and kids club. Room was clean. Overall stay: Happy!

title: Decent holiday for some time away from the city
desc: We had a nice weekend getaway at ShangriLa Rasa. The service was really good at their restaurant - although we wished there was more variety available (just one restaurant operating at the moment). We wanted to dine at the pizzeria but realized it's actually outside of the hotel and needs a prior reservation. The in room dining and restaurant service was very good. The beach, pool, and surrounding activities are really nice and our time spent at the beach was the highlight of our trip. The boating activities are also great fun for the family. Due to covid restrictions all the activities have to be prebooked in advance therefore taking out the spontaneity out of a holiday, but at least it was a good break from the routine.

title: Faulty towers is 10 times better
desc: Faulty towers rates better. Checkin. Clark didn‚Äôt get the concept of our pre check in submission reservations had send. Doing all the data entry again which took 20 minutes. Then he didn‚Äôt understand a credit card terminal inadvertently cancelling my AMEX card, then double charging my Visa. The suite we got is in serious need of maintenance. Bath cannot be drained as bottom is missing. Sink skirting is falling apart. Mould in the edges. Restaurant serves cold food for me and takes 40 minutes for a kids meal to come out. Carpark attendant wants to interrogate for 15 minutes before he allowed me to park my car

title: CNY Staycation
desc: Once again, had a wonderful and enjoyable experience. They gave us a our favourite room. Housekeeping took good care of us. Breakfast was truly a unique dining experience. Booking the pool and beach areas was very smooth and delightful experience. On first day of Chinese New Year, we were presented with a box of Chinese New Year Goodies and a cake - Thank you very much for the kind gesture! We will definitely be back very soon!!

title: Must be 1 of the kids' All Time Favourite!
desc: [Deluxe Sea View Suite King] I stayed with my family of 3 for my girl's 2nd birthday celebration. It knew it was the right choice seeing so many other families over there as well! Enjoying the pool mostly! Shangri-La is a VERY kids-friendly hotel. From kids activities rooms, playarea, and 3 different pool zones. There is just too much to explore in just 3 days 2 nights! ‚òÜNUMEROUS PLAY AREAS‚òÜ Our kid is still too young for the activity in the kids room but she totally enjoyed the todds playarea! I was so glad it was really well cushioned everywhere and sufficiently big enough for us parents to join our todds as they explore this play space. There is another bigger treehouse play area for the older kids. They were many kids but still felt safe because there's actually a staff

title: Disappointing
desc: They charge for everything! I wanted to arrange for amenities in the room for a special occasion (anniversary) and they wanted to charge me $30 for a box of chocolate and macarons when I'm spending a bomb on the room? The room and hotel are rundown and old, definitely long overdue for a renovation. The staff are not as friendly and very inconsistent service. Disappointing.

title: Awesome and Fun Staycation!
desc: To celebrate my sons 12 year birthday, we booked 2 nights Rasa Family Fun package stay directly on Shangri-la website which includes sumptuous brekkie and seafood buffet. The room and view was stunning with great amenities in the hotel. Service over all was TOP Notch! Smooth and fast check in at the front desk despite the weekend. Water sports activities - Kayak, etc was open complimentary to Hotel guest. A Big compliment to Front Desk Shawn Tan and Dining staff Nicholas for going all out and surprising my son with Chocolates and Ice cream. Thank you from the bottom of our heart! Overall it was an awesome staycation and ... the food was awesome! Keep up the wonderful service ! Thank you!

title: Very disappointed!
desc: We decided to return to Rasa Sentosa to celebrate the hubby‚Äôs birthday after a fabulous stay last year. We had a pool view room with fantastic views and the room was squeaky clean without a speck of dust. Fast forward to present day, we entered our assigned room anticipating the same ‚Äúwow‚Äù but were left disappointed from the moment we stepped in. Our pool view room is in fact a tree view room and the balcony was littered with leaves. Not sure what I did wrong as I thought I did everything right - made a direct booking via Shangri-La and not through 3rd party sites and completed mobile check in as soon as I was able to. I even remarked that this stay is a birthday celebration during booking. Sad to say, I believe we will not be returning after this stay. Thanks to Allison

title: Housekeeping service requires multiple followups
desc: Nice hotel. Great beach side and pool Breakfast spread is nice. Overall nice property. Cleanliness was good. But house keeping service had to be followed up many times. Reason cited was hotel is heavily booked.

title: A Serene place!
desc: Resort is excellent - from the pool area, the restaurants, room standard, room service, etc. The buffet breakfasts were awesome with seven food stations. Everything was good and our stay was very happy !

title: Children claimed that this is the best hotel ever
desc: We booked the Shangrila Rasa Family package for staycation. My children claimed that it was the best staycation so far; early checkin and late checkout, free room upgrade, access to beach and pool, good buffet breakfast and dinner spread, free flow of beverages including wine and beer, half the price of Capella Singapore, games and activities including sea sports throughout the stay. Also, found a letter written by my girl on the table. The other staycation contestants were: Capella 1BR Villa Ritz club room Fullerton St Regis Capri and many others‚Ä¶..

title: Very Kid Friendly Beach Resort
desc: I stayed with my wife and 4-year old, for a beach holiday. The little one LOVED the beach and couldn't get enough of it. Overall, it was a good holiday. But the rooms were too small for the amount of money paid. Positives: - Has a private beach, with ample deck chairs and loungers. - The beach has very gentle waves (like a lake), soft sand, no sharp stones. Ideal for little ones wanting to splash around and build sand castles. - Large system of pools with slides, water fountains and lots of features for kids to remain entertained. - Large kids club with loads of activities - Housekeeping was very good and timely. - Generous with drinking water bottles in the room - Excellent fast Wifi throughout the property (except pool and beach - where it barely existed). Negatives: - Food

title: Disappointed
desc: We checked in yesterday and requested early check-in due to an early flight arrival from the US. They were able to accommodate after an extra charge, but unfortunately, we realized last night that there was sand in our bed under the sheets(we had not gone to the beach or had slept in the room yet). Clearly, the bed had not been turned over before the room had been released to us. They will refund the extra early check-in charge, but definitely disappointing especially given the ongoing Covid pandemic.

title: Mostly good, but a few suggestions for service improvement.
desc: Brought our children to this resort, as we had heard quite a lot about it. Overall, a very good experience, although there were some issues at the start. First, the good points: - Generally very child friendly. Hotel has pop up games stalls, balloon sculpting and other activities for kids. There is an indoor children's play area which is segregated by age (4 and below vs 5 and above). - Great access to pool and beach. Pool is large with many different sections. Has water slides for children, which are well supervised by hotel staff. Beach has kayaking, stand up paddling, and paddle boats. - Good food at the hotel restaurants, the main ones are on Level 3 (serve buffet breakfast). For breakfast, dining is split into different seating times (6.30 am to 8am, 8 am to 9.30 am,

title: Shangri-la is tired and overpriced
desc: I stayed at the Shangri la recently with my family and was really disappointed. We paid an absolute fortune for a cramped, smelly old room that was in desperate need of an upgrade. It wasn‚Äôt until after our stay that I was told the hotel was used as a COVID isolation location and it really showed. The staff, were largely friendly, but Singapore in general seems to have lost a lot of its polite, considerate hospitality professionals and it is now more sterile, less accommodating and overall a less enjoyable place to visit in my experience.

title: Fantastic
desc: Outstanding in every way that matters. First and most important, the staff are amazing, thank you so much all of you. The breakfast is out of this world. The beds are wonderful. Yes the rooms are a little dated but they are so comfortable. The person who complained on an earlier review about pillow menus really needs to look at their first world problem. Nothing was too much trouble and the pizzas on the beach were just the best. I felt so safe and welcome here. The pool was beautiful too. Thank you so much for our wonderful stay, I cannot wait to return.

title: Good property at beach
desc: Excellent property on the silo so beach. Amenities are great with kids play area, kids water activities swimming pool . It is a right at the beach property. The entrance is a 50 m walk from the cable car boating point ( internal sentosa). The best part if there is a 7-11 right there because of which you can get lot of stuff such as drinks and food to your room which is far cheaper than hotel rates. Near by attractions are silo so beach. Bungy jumping. Wings of fire

title: Wow Family vacation - truly impress
desc: Great family vacation! This is one hotel that you would find yourself all day at the pool or doing water sports. Great fun crew by shangri-La Sentosa, never a dull moment. Water sports activities be it low or high tide, activities at the pool to keep the atmosphere going, and numerous slides for the kids to enjoy. Great job by the fun crew! As well as kids fun area, art and craft changes everyday. Breakfast and dinner buffet spread is also impressive, the staff despite the huge crowd makes sure you would be well taken care of. The spread changes every day, and despite staying for 3 nights, dinner menus keep changing. Well done in the f&b team, especially the server Kim, her service is impeccable. Well done Shangri-La Sentosa, the place for family vacation.

title: Excellent Hotel
desc: What a famous hotel brand become worthy is not only being guarantee a high quality of service to customers, but also more important pocess an excellent management to lead the team to take care of all customers even though assit customers to solve problem and provide solutions. Especially, let's sincerely appreciate your honour staff named Jonathan Raj, whom is such role model as I mentioned. What's he gave us a wonderful enjoyment and beautiful memoris during we have spent 6 days in Shangri-la, which is a marvellous feeling we have never experienced since we traveled around many accommodation of the world. Such kind and educated staff in your hotel really make us so impressive to certainly match up your excellent brand which is a brilliant glory among the environment of

title: Fell short of a 5 star experience.
desc: Previous reviewers have captured some of the positives very well. Staff were lovely, the pool area is nice, the breakfast was included and very good (multiple world cuisines), and the hotel has spacious, clean rooms. Ideally located next to the cable car terminal which was a lot of fun to ride, and close to Universal Studios etc. They allowed an early check-in due to availability, and the food/ drink quality at all locations was good - especially the Asian dishes but the Italian was good also. Downsides are not major derailers, and some cannot be changed by the resort, but they nudge the score down. The hotel is a large unattractive concrete building which must be nightmarish to maintain. It is tired, not only the fabric but the fixtures and fittings. The outdoor furniture is

title: Bad service
desc: Horrible service from the team. Our company did a group booking for us and they were supposed to get us the keys at 3pm for check in. We waited for more than an hour and they said our rooms were ready but they couldn‚Äôt give us the keys as they were processing it. Their service attitude were horrible when we questioned them about the delay. Very appalled given its a 5 star hotel and the service staff‚Äôs response was ‚ÄúThere is no use if you rush me, there is nothing I can do‚Äù. Extremely rude replies from the staff and I will make sure to never book with Shangri la group again

title: Great Resort, Great Stay
desc: We had great time celebrating our daughter birthday at ShangriLa Rasa Sentosa. The guest relation team did great job to provide birthday amenity for my daughter, thank you. although the hotel is old but very well maintained and clean with great facilities for families. Room is super clean, we get at 10F facing beautiful scenery of pool and beach both day and night. the lighting is just gorgeous. it has amenities for kids. The breakfast and food (Trapizza) is exceptional. The breakfast buffet provides various and delicious foods. The breakfast is much much better than other hotels in sentosa (Sofitel, hardrock, equarius, Michael). we really enjoyed the facilities mainly the pool and beach activities. Thank you to several peoples who makes our stay more memorable and made us

title: No more comment
desc: Not too much to comment at all... Outdated rooms, poor facilities, receptionists just not capable to work in a so called 5 star hotel‚Ä¶ beach access is the only selling point‚Ä¶ one time experience, not coming back ever. Wouldnt recommend to anyone:

title: A really enjoyable stay.
desc: I had already decided to book this hotel without much research simply based on its location and the fact I thought it would be fun for my young family. The travel agent I was using initially tried to place us elsewhere on Sentosa, a half hearted attempt saying that there were no rooms available on the dates i required, a quick check with the hotel direct and this proved to be not the case although there were only a handful left. I stuck to my choice and we managed to book two sea view rooms. Closer to our arrival I began to read reviews, as one does, and there were quite a few disappointing ones, along with many praising their stay. Seeds of doubt kick in and then you feel that your whole family are going to be pointing the finger at you if those negative reviews materialise

title: Excellent resort
desc: Everything about this resort is excellent - from the pool area, the restaurants, room standard, room service, etc. The buffet breakfasts were awesome with seven food stations. We thoroughly enjoyed our four nights stay at this resort.

title: Worth every penny!!!!
desc: Visited for CNY staycation. We enjoy every single things about our stay. The location, the room, the pool, are amazing!! We really enjoy the mini watersports that available at shangrila private beach and also the foods at the property are really good too

title: Loved It!
desc: What a fabulous resort! Yes the rooms are a tiny bit tired but still very comfortable and very clean. The facilities more than make up for a tired room. The staff were fabulous in every area of the Resort. The grounds are fabulous and the resort is close to all transport. Breakfast was very good, the pool bar drinks and food were excellent, room service food was extremely tasty. Can not wait to return!

title: Need better staff training
desc: Although the facilities here are old but it‚Äôs still enjoyable for family visit with kids. But I will highly suggest better staff training. The front desk and restaurant staff attitude is very bad and unprofessional. This is the first Shangri-La I‚Äôve stayed in with such unprofessional staff training and I did not feel welcomed at all. Despite this, the kids activities such as balloon making, facilities, and games are great. The hotel is great but please train better staffs to live up to 5 star expectations!

title: Lively Holiday in Shangri La
desc: Excellent hotel. Very good for families with plenty to keep children occupied and happy. Adults can unwind and relax. The sea and beach are immaculate with some sports available. Very close to attractions i.e. Mega Zip, Universal studios ,Fort Siloso and sky walk, Water Park . Plenty of eateries and restaurants. The Hotel is over 11 floors. Large bedrooms with fridge lovely decor and very comfortable beds with quiet air conditioning. Plenty of wardrobe space. Good size balcony with comfortable chairs. There are free facilities for washing and drying clothes on alternate floors and ice making machines. The food is excellent mainly served as a buffet. but A la carte is also available. The tastes are incredible and as much as you wish. The fish choices are amazing

title: Relaxing week
desc: Very enjoyable week at the resort. All staff were courteous and professional. Great view of the beach from our room on the 11th floor. The pool and surrounding area was relaxing and the adults only end of the pool was much appreciated. There is a bus stop close to hotel for exploring Sentosa. Fort Siloso is also next to the hotel and definitely worth visiting. The buffet for lunch and dinner is expensive and detracted slightly from our overall enjoyment. However, the free bus to Sentosa Cove provided us with dining options. Highly recommend Shangri-La Rasa Sentosa.

title: Best kids friendly hotel!
desc: We last had our staycay here 10 years ago. All I can say at the end of our stay is truly great fun, not only for the kids but us parents, too! We checked-in after 4pm but only 1 room is ready as we requested for connecting rooms. We were given complimentary dinner for this which was awesome! At dinner, we had additional paying guests and given the limited halal (Indian) cuisine, the manager offered further discount to our bill - thank you, very much appreciated! Very friendly service staff everywhere you go, shuttle bus to Vivo, Sentosa cable car line and bus stop just outside the hotel, we even enjoyed kayaking everyday at the sea sports centre. Honestly, there‚Äôs so much to love here especially the pools & beach so we didn‚Äôt really get out much throughout our stay. We

title: Great Resort with poor hospitality and stubborn staff
desc: Considering a Shangri-la brand hotel, we came here with great expectations ( Few years back I got complimentary Shangri-la Circle membership with Taj Innercirle Gold membership). Taj has set a level of hospitality benchmark in Industry and Taj having a tieup with Shangri-la, guest treatment and hospitality expectations were high. 1) We arrived at 2 PM in scorching heat, reached reception, there was no one to attend / No welcome drink. 2) A person at reception asked us to join "Queue" for checkin desk. It is expected that you will be asked to sit down in lobby, then be called for checkin as per turn. 3) The duty manager at reception asked for Credit card details. We gave Diners club card ( Not accepted by their POS machine) then we gave a VISA card. In few seconds got a

title: Great family stay at a fantastic hotel
desc: This is a fantastic hotel with staff who are excellent throughout the resort. We arrived on an early flight and were allowed an early check in which was a real bonus for us as we were absolutely shattered. The hotel has lots of facilities for the whole family and the kids slides and play area were a great addition to the entertainment. We were quite busy doing things out of resort on Sentosa and the courtesy bus at the end of the hotel driveway, which connects you to all of Sentosa was a bonus and very convenient. I‚Äôm not convinced that you can spend more than 4 days on Sentosa itself because although there‚Äôs things to do it‚Äôs probably best to combine it with Singapore island. Back to the hotel and we had the Rasa family package which allowed us to make use of the evening

title: Nice stay
desc: The hotel has nice location which can access to the beach. Places are very clean and we had a relaxing vacation. Conceige staff is well trained. Just one thing they have to improve is the waiting time for breakfast. The staff in the restaurant are less efficient. The manager has to find a way to speed up the plates clearing time.

title: Great for kids
desc: Great place to stay with kids. Our boys 5 & 7 really enjoyed the slides and beach activities on offer. It's close to a Sentosa bus stop and cable car. Rooms are comfortable and easily slept the 4 of us on a king bed and sofa bed.

title: Very expensive in buffet restaurant..
desc: Nice hotel a little dated and not the standard as other Shangri-las I have stayed. Mainly targeting families with daily entertainment by the pool for the children. The beach was polluted not advisable for swimming. The food in main restaurant was buffet approx Inc tax $95... which was very expensive for each meal if staying a week and with children. It would be more affordable to go out to eat on Sentosa.

title: Wonderful stay
desc: Love the room! Spotless clean ! The housekeeping team did a wonderful job. They always seems happy and greeted me with a big smile. I feel welcomed and home always. The view is spectacular also. Everything day is a happy day for me to stay in this hotel.

title: Memorable stay at Shangrila
desc: This was our 2nd visit to Singapore so we decided to stay at Sentosa this time.....we booked Shangrila Resort after reading many reviews that it is kids friendly resort....We stayed for 4 nights and our stay was very good and comfortable. We reached the resort at 7 a.m and they checked us in the room without any extra charges....Our 3 yr old enjoyed the kids activities, kids club and kids pool very much.....They also have kids friendly menu.....so yes Shangrila is definitely a kid friendly resort......We get a Bus to go to Resorts world and around the Island from just outside the gate....The cable car Station is also just outside the resort...There is also a bus from lobby to Vivo City mall ...Coming to food the Buffet Breakfast had lot of options for everyone......We had dinner

title: Not the best experience
desc: Shangri la Rosa Sentosa was a final two day relax after visiting Europe back home to New Zealand. The welcome at reception and the baggage handling was all good. On checking in my wife and I were told we had twin beds. We asked to change and they advised we would need to push them together. Our room was 11 floor but faced trees and for the price we expected a better view. Reception kindly offered a complimentary Cho Liya‚Äôs or mini bar, we said mini bar but this never arrived , we reminded them on day two to be told it‚Äôs only soft drinks and apologies for not delivering. We ate in the diver shell cafe and advised we should not order al a cart as it would take an hour, rather we should use the buffet. There was hardly any food left as it was about 8pm. But they charged us s$86

title: Great getaway in Sentosa
desc: We just got back, stayed there for a week for vacation (April Spring Break 2023). Take these notes if you consider booking: 1. Entering Sentosa Island starting April 2023 will cost you SGD $6 per entrance. You can enter for FREE, so long that you go through gate 1 or 2, where there will be a gate guard (other gates are Auto-Pay). You must so the gate guard some kind of proof that you are a hotel/resort guest, can be an email confirmation or your hotel room card. Otherwise, your taxi driver will add that $6 to your fare each time. 2. Get the breakfast buffet package. They breakfast has Chinese, Indian, Noodles, American, fruits, juice, coffee/cap and tea. title: To APP or not to APP
desc: This should be five stars, but this one thing has me APP‚Äôed. Shangri La is a beautiful property, absolutely gorgeous pool. RM 1165 is beautiful. If available get it. Staff was exceptional, especially the person who checked us in. But, alas there‚Äôs always that one guy who you want to focus your attention to. And, that person is the bartender at the pool bar. On Sunday I didn‚Äôt take my reading glasses to the pool. I‚Äôm blind as a bat. I walked to the bar to order a drink. The bartender said you tell me what you want, I‚Äôll deliver it to you. Odd, he couldn‚Äôt just make it for me. But I walked back to the lounger and waited, and waited. A staff member walked by and I asked if I could order a drink, he said yes, order from the APP. He walked away. I realized this wasn‚Äôt going

title: Lovely to be back
desc: My family and I stayed two nights and had two rooms on separate levels. This was about the 6th time we have stayed as we always love to return. This time would probably rate as our favourite stay and feel Rasa has got better. The staff were superb, ALWAYS friendly, Aw in particular, always bright and bubbly, a word to management, he's a keeper!! I loved the increase in wildlife, beautiful Monitors, Peacocks and the odd Monkey. The room was nicely serviced and our house keeping staff was lovely. The pool staff, the "Fun Crew" were superb, very fun orientated. We loved the Silver Shell restaurant for breakfast, great options as I have mentioned in a separate review, a huge shout out the Indian kitchen and chef's. We will return again on our next visit to Singapore.

title: Great experience - fantastic staff and kid-friendly facilities.
desc: First time staying at Shangri-La Rasa Sentosa. While the hotel looks a bit dated from outside - the interiors are fantastic. The pool areas are always packed full of activities. The staff is friendly and always willing to help out. I was very surprised when my room was upgraded to a big one with a view and decent space for my family. It was indeed a great treat as we were celebrating my wife's birthday. The hotel is very family friendly as there's a huge variety of activities for kids. My son had a great time at the Cool Zone when he got to do some art and crafts, and also some maze climbing. There was a slight mishap at the waterslide area as he swerved too fast and hit his head hard. The staff reacted promptly and gave directions for medical advice which was well appreciated.

title: Well done Shangri-La Sentosa, you have our loyalty
desc: 5 out of 5. Exceptional check in and check out. Exceptional service recovery from an incident out of their control show the culture and standards here are the best in the world. When the Singapore government shut down power for annual testing from 11pm to 7am, the team with great care relocated us to Shangri-La Valley Wing in the CBD so I could achieve my meeting schedule and our young kids would be comfortable. Special mention to Vin the Front Desk manager and Kathleen Grace who checked us in. We live close by in Indonesia and will be back again soon. Buffet breakfast is excellent and room service food choice and flavour also excellent.

title: Great place for families with young kiddies
desc: If you like the sun and sand.. This is a great place popular with families with young children to unwind and relax. However, there are very limited parking lots available and only 1 staff to manage the incoming cars at the main entrance .. Carpark was full at about 4pm and there was a long queue. And there are no security check at the carpark /beachfront facilities area to verify if you're a resident / event guest. Took the terrace room on a high floor. Very spacious.. Clean and comfortable. Kudos to the housekeeping team.

title: Tardy business practices
desc: We had a great stay with one problem. On check-in we were charged $100 Singapore per day of stay for incidentals which was fine, however, getting the refund of unused funds is very tardy. We checked out on 22/7 and today 25/8 still no refund. Was told it takes 21 business days for the refund. Still waiting.....not impressed at all

title: Wonderful Experience
desc: We took a cruise from Singapore and stayed at the Shangri La Rasa Sentosa for three nights before we left. It was a great way to adjust to the new time zone. There are lots of restaurants and both a beautiful beach and huge pool. There is also a free shuttle to the city, which we used, but didn‚Äôt really need to leave the resort! Everything we needed was there. Great place for adults and families with children.

title: Fairly unremarkable, tired hotel
desc: Stayed for 3 nights here and the location is about the best thing going for it - walking distance to the cable car and shuttle bus to all the Sentosa resorts. The hotel overall feels very tired and way overdue a refit, it looks on the outside like it was built in the 70‚Äôs and the rooms looked like they were last updated 20+ years ago. It‚Äôs also very expensive when you‚Äôre there - ¬£12 for a large draft beer !! The breakfast was pretty good and so was the restaurant so that pulled it round a bit. We ate in the Italian restaurant which was 5 mins along the beach which was ok. The pool was unremarkable but there were always loungers available. If we were to go back to Sentosa we would definitely not stay here again and would try one of the other hotels on the island.

title: The best resort for young families if your budget allows it
desc: We visited at the end of June with two 4 year olds & a 6 year old. We had the best time, absolutely loving our 6 night stay. We did not want to leave! Pros - Pool, pool slides & splash pad were perfect for young kids - Pool stays open late (great when you have jet lag) - Poolside activities such as face painting & balloon making - Kids club (drop off for over 5, although they let me drop off my 4 year olds too as they really wanted to hang with their big sister ) my kids loved it and asked to go everyday. - Food. Poolside dining was a huge hit for us. Enjoyed both buffet breakfast & dinner (tip - become a circle member online to redeem a 25% off voucher). One night we even had arm painting and a roaming magician to entertain the kids whilst we waited for food. - Guest

title: Best Service
desc: I would like to thank to concierge team and reception team for welcoming us, thank to Mr. Vin of front office for his amazing service, for providing best room and best view with amenities, My family really appreciate it, housekeeping team very helpful and friendly. will be back again soon‚Ä¶

title: Definitely aimed towards a holiday with children
desc: Stayed here for 4 nights and it was a great location for exploring Sentosa. Go to the adults only breakfast on the 6 th floor for a delicious array of food and some peace and quiet. Very attentive and friendly service from the two lovely ladies Karen and her offsider. The hotel rooms are looking a little dated and unfortunately the bed mattress was very hard but they accommodated my concern by offering another topper pad which did help. Staff were generally friendly and helpful. Lifeguard in attendance and games arranged at regular times for the kids at the pool. After checkout we stayed at the pool and there were shower facilities here we could use before we left for our flight.

title: The Worst Shangri-La Hotel
desc: This is the worst Shangri-la Hotels I visited so far. I had tried staying a few Shangri-La Hotels in Hong Kong, China, Japan, Bangkok, Tanjung Aru (Sabah), and this Shangri-La Rasa Sentosa is worst among these. The Housekeeping is not up to standard and always had used/dirty towels left in the bathroom (the towels were not used by us. Did not replace used Bathrobe until I asked which was already 3 days later. And some mistakes like, did not refill the empty tissue box. The another problem is the frontdesk, on the day we arrived, we had questions on how our room would be arranged and the manager was extremely rude. The restaurant is also another problem, for the breakfast, only the Indian food is okay, the rest are actually tasted not as good as other Shangri-La Hotels. Also

title: Decompression journey
desc: I am writing to express my satisfaction with my recent stay at your hotel. I want to commend your staff for their friendly and courteous service, which contributed to a wonderful overall experience. The atmosphere was truly relaxing, and I felt like I was on a perfect vacation. One of the highlights of my stay was the pool area. The pool had a great ambiance, and there were frequent interactive programs that kept the guests entertained. The presence of a slide for children added to their enjoyment. Furthermore, the pool's proximity to the beach was convenient, allowing guests to easily access a variety of free water activities. I would like to extend my appreciation to one of your employees, Jonathan. He was exceptionally kind and went above and beyond to ensure our comfort.

title: Best family holiday ever!
desc: Wow! Honestly the most relaxing holiday since becoming parents. We have visited Singapore before but this was our first time with our son. We are so glad we chose Shangri La. We booked for 2 weeks and had 1 week more to travel in Malaysia but we changed plans and stayed a 3rd week here. That‚Äôs how amazing it was! We didn‚Äôt want to leave. The staff from the moment we checked in until we departed where nothing but fabulous! Nothing was to hard for them. So accommodating. We arrived late at night with a grumpy toddler, they gave him his own bag of beach toys and colouring book and pencils. Fantastic range of food and drinks at breakfast. The F&B team are amazing!! Big shout out to the lovely Theevanair who made sure we had the best seats at the resort‚Äôs restaurants day or

title: An incredible stay. Great hotel. Loved it!
desc: We had an incredible time at the Shangri-La Sentosa. A special thanks to Eddie, Liz, Ivy and the duty manager who helped me upon checkout (sorry I didn‚Äôt catch his name) for going above and beyond for our stay. We can‚Äôt wait to come back one day. Stayed here with my husband for our 10 year wedding anniversary and 2 children ages 8 and 6. Kids club staff were also amazing. Pools are great. Good temperature too, as I don‚Äôt like getting in freezing cold pools. Thanks for a wonderful time. Great memories formed üòÉüôèüåü

title: September Holiday
desc: Planned a little getaway for the kids to enjoy during the September holiday. The hotel was almost fully booked but we managed to grab 2 rooms. Picked the holiday based on the kid friendly location, a good place when travelling with kids. For sure the best hotel in Sentosa Island. Staff were friendly. Rooms are spacious and well maintained.
